Name: Paug
About the game: A fireball, spirits and a pyramid. What can happen? Move your racket and beat the spirit in a duel. Paug is a small game inspired by the hit of the 70s. It takes place in Egypt where the spirits of the pharaohs wake up, angry after your intrusion into their tombs. You can play alone or up to 2 players locally. What to face your friends for an evening!
